attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the british people are fed up of all the lies and spin and broken promises he should resign,and let the the people choose who should be prime minister.someone who does listen to the people and what they want and not pretend to listen and not the selected little groups or hanger ons they visit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
